Hugh
Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone

Thanks. This is helpful. We can talk tomorrow about the timing.
It will also be helpful to get some information about staffing at MCC I've seen additional press reports trying to link the staffing shortages, overtime and
Thanks,
